title: Professional League of Legends LoL Coaching | Challenger Coach | GER/ENG |
body:
Hey,

you need help in Dynamic Q ? Then you should check out our new coaching offers:


We will go through replays together with a shared screen. Learn about items, laning phase, warding, roaming and how to carry as a support player.
Price: 20€ / hour;
 Elo:
 Bronze- Master for ADC and Supp
 Bronze-Diamond 2 for Midlane
 Bronze- Diamond 4 for Toplane and Jungle
For any Questions add husky3533 on skype

replies.body: DAS IST DAS DEUTSCHE FORUM SCHREIB DEUTSCH ODER GEH INS ENGLISCHE {{champion:17}}  ich hoffe ich konnte dir helfen
